Sauces
Treats

Jalapeno Cilantro Dip

Notes

Good dipping sauce for plain rippled chips or crudités. Also goes well on a burger or fried chicken sandwich.

What's in it
  • 3/4 cups of mayo
  • 1/4 sour cream
  • 2 minced jalapenos
  • 1 lime
  • 1 lemon
  • 1 tbsp of chopped Cilantro
  • salt to taste
What to do
  • Mix everything in a bowl
  • Boo yah
